summary: Cordon-Cardo 2 Ph.D. is the Principal Investigatorrogram Director. He is also the Chairman of the Committee on Biostatistics and Public Health at Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center. For more information on Colin B. Cordon, visit his website: www.cordoncardo.com.
